2KyvW0.translation: The unaffected partner’s policy will remain active.

6+zTcI.translation: If you get a partial payout, your policy will remain active.

7dTPue.translation: You’ll each start out with your own policy

B+/blC.translation: Your total coverage will not decrease by the amount that’s already been paid out.

I5s2uf.translation: If either or both of you are diagnosed with a critical illness, the affected partner(s) will submit a claim.

WMvSoH.translation: Most customers like you apply for {cov, number, ::group-min-2 currency/CAD unit-width-narrow precision-integer} in coverage over a {term, number}-year policy term

af3SO9.translation: Once your claim is reviewed and approved, you’ll either get a full or partial payout depending on the condition.

xyPXg8.translation: If you apply with your partner, your final rate will include the 10% Couples Discount for the first year once your application is approved.
